name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing robust GraphQL APIs and RESTful services within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **GraphQL**, **SQL**, **NoSQL**, and experienced in implementing messaging systems with **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**. Skilled in constructing CI/CD pipelines and deploying applications on **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, ensuring high availability and scalability. Adept at monitoring and logging using **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and the **ELK** stack, maintaining performance and reliability. Strong understanding of secure development principles, compliant with **OWASP Top 10**, and focused on implementing authentication standards like **OAuth2**, **OIDC**, and **JWT**. Additionally, brings hands-on expertise in both frontend and backend development using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven capability in building AI/ML-integrated platforms, driving automation, predictive analytics, and real-time processing, along with a solid background in MLOps including **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
